Here is a guideline to help you decide who you will pick!
Who do you feel is an honest individual?
Strong in character? One that has been up front and honest about all aspects of his life, and past? One that has surrounded himself with people that you can also respect and trust?
Read about their views on issues before they began campaigning for school position.
Often this is much more revealing of the true stance on issues than what they say during a campaign.
Who says what he means, and means what he says? Who do you think is speaking from his heart, and truly cares about the of students at your school?
Who cares more about his/her fellow students, then his/her desire to have the position in the school.
1. Connect to WIFI (Choose wifi network within the voting poll).
2. Open the Electrovots Application.
3. Click Vote Button
4. To login, enter your username and password (It is case sensitive, so type it as it is).
5. Now choose a position. (Be careful not to click submit button when you are not yet done in choosing your desired candidate, or else you may not cast your vote again).
6. In the list of candidate, tap your desired candidate and then tap orange button to confirm.
7. To be able to vote straight, tap the vote straight button. (Remember that vote straight means voting all candidates of a particular party list on all position).
8. Then click your desired party list to vote.
9. It will show the list of the candidate in the party list, tap OK for confirmation.
10. Finally, tap the orange button to confirm.
11. Once you are done choosing your desired candidate on each position, tap submit button once more.
12. The application will show you the list of the candidates that you have been chosen, click OK for confirmation or Cancel and go back to Step 5 to modify your current list of candidates.
13. After doing all the Steps 1 to 12, expect that your vote is casted and ready for the tally. Thank you for using Electrovots.
